paper_abstract: We study the problem of finding, in a given word, all maximal gapped palindromes verifying two types of constraints, that we call long-armed and length-constrained palindromes. For each of the two classes, we propose an algorithm that runs in time O(n + S) for a constant-size alphabet. where S is the number of output palindromes. Both algorithms can be extended to compute biological gapped palindromes within the same time bound. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
